content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [IDDate]
,[Date]
,[Year]
,[Month]
,[Day]
 FROM [dbo].[datetable]

 DROP TABLE dbo.datetable

 CREATE TABLE datetable (
    IDDate INT,
    [Date] DATE,
    [Year] INT,
    [Month] INT,
    [Day] INT,
    CONSTRAINT PK_datetable_IDDate PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (IDDate) NOT ENFORCED
);
